    Function reference

    All functions

    DAR_by_LRT()
    Compute p value for DAR test between two cell types
    PIC_counting()
    Title PIC-counting data matrix
    count_peaks()
    Count number of paired insertions in each peak
    data_frame_to_GRanges()
    convert peak_set into GRanges object if input is a data.frame
    .insertion_to_c12()
    given insertion rate, calculate theoretical distribution under condition 1 and 2
    get_r_by_ct_mat_pq()
    Get region (peak) by cell type matrix and per cell capturing rate
    load_fragments()
    Function for loading fragment files and filter by cell barcodes
    obs_to_insertion_ME()
    Title Moment estimator for insertion rates from observed values
    obs_to_insertion_MLE_lam()
    Calculate the insertion rate from observed PIC counts
    obs_to_insertion_MLE_obj()
    Title Calculate the optimal loss from observed PIC counts
